name: Driskoll
description:
Driskoll is a 2D action-adventure game set in the big city.

You play as a newbie to the crime scene, just starting out. But throughout the course of this game you become the biggest boss in town! Owning every business on the block, the fastest (and most expensive) supercars in the world, and becoming the most well known criminal in the country!

//DEVNOTE//

This project is still in VERY EARLY DEVELOPMENT. It is currently nowhere near completion, so patience would be greatly appreciated :)
